I'm tired of trying to do things

@DreamHost @DreamHostCare @DreamHost @dhstatus Please make an effort to remedy this situation immediately without me having to tweet at you throughout the whole process, I cannot imagine how you would feel if the email address all your clients use was suddenly unusable and your web host was unhelpful

@DreamHost @DreamHostCare I have been with @DreamHost for over 10 years and host over 28 websites through them - this whole experience has been so bad, their support so ineffectual, that I am seriously considering moving to a new service for the first time It would take days, but this is unacceptable.

@DreamHost @DreamHostCare So @DreamHost and @DreamHostCare never figured out my issue leaving me to move all of my professional comms to a different email address (hell) – now, 20 days later, I get an automated email that they think the address was compromised? https://t.co/YscEb4BmIA

commits.message: feat: redesign color controls with clean layout and remove emoji icons
fix: clean white slider thumbs with subtle shadows
feat: data-driven gradients for all color sliders
fix: adapt floating controls to light/dark mode
feat: complete per-color math and colored sliders
feat: per-color math presets and colored sliders
feat: add tooltips to all color control sliders
feat: bigger color swatches with more slider space
fix: per-color reset buttons now work correctly
feat: additive color offsets with global link system
fix: repair reset functionality and add reset all button
feat: make color swatches sticky on scroll
feat: add theme presets dropdown
feat: add reset buttons to all editable color swatches
feat: add 4 more syntax colors + more vertical space
feat: per-color lightness + prominent red base hue slider
feat: add inline offset sliders to color swatches
feat: add individual per-color offset controls
fix: comments now respect monochrome mode
enhance monochrome mode and expand color palette
initial commit: minimal ghostty theme builder
style: make nav vertical stacking on mobile
refactor: add contact form and component
projects: update project page with screenshots
